about.title: About me
about.content:
I am a Front-end developer. Over the past 5+ years, I've been building quality web applications by connecting business goals with user needs. Developed Lending, CRM, ORM, market place

Currently I am a team leader, I organize the work of the team taking into account the interests and priorities of the customer.

I ensure that the product meets the interests of the business, monitor the effectiveness of the team in the context of business processes

Previously worked in Credo studio, Viento and freelancing
